package main

//This file is auto-generated by go-raml
//Do not edit this file by hand since it will be overwritten during the next generation

import (
	"github.com/gorilla/mux"
	"github.com/justinas/alice"
	"net/http"
)

type DeliveriesInterface interface {
	// Get a list of deliveries
	// It is handler for GET /deliveries
	Get(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)

	// Create/request a new delivery
	// It is handler for POST /deliveries
	Post(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)

	// Get information on a specific delivery
	// It is handler for GET /deliveries/{deliveryId}
	deliveryIdGet(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)

	// Update the information on a specific delivery
	// It is handler for PATCH /deliveries/{deliveryId}
	deliveryIdPatch(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)

	// Cancel a specific delivery
	// It is handler for DELETE /deliveries/{deliveryId}
	deliveryIdDelete(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request)
}

func DeliveriesInterfaceRoutes(r *mux.Router, i DeliveriesInterface) {
	r.Handle("/deliveries", alice.New(oauth2_oauth_2_0_queryMwr, oauth2_oauth_2_0_query_ADMINISTRATORMwr).Then(http.HandlerFunc(i.Get))).Methods("GET")
	r.Handle("/deliveries", alice.New(oauth2_oauth_2_0_headerMwr).Then(http.HandlerFunc(i.Post))).Methods("POST")
	r.HandleFunc("/deliveries/{deliveryId}", i.deliveryIdGet).Methods("GET")
	r.Handle("/deliveries/{deliveryId}", alice.New(oauth2_oauth_2_0_headerMwr).Then(http.HandlerFunc(i.deliveryIdPatch))).Methods("PATCH")
	r.Handle("/deliveries/{deliveryId}", alice.New(oauth2_oauth_2_0_headerMwr).Then(http.HandlerFunc(i.deliveryIdDelete))).Methods("DELETE")
}
